00, Chitrachedu Village, Peddavadugur Mandal, Anantapur District. (Aadhaar No: XXXX XXXX XXXX) Cell No. 7013383895
The settlement document I have signed and given is that you are my husband. Out of my love and affection for you, considering love as the reward, and with the thought of acquiring some fixed property in your name without any reward, I have given you the property as a gift without any reward as per the schedule to which I am entitled, and this very day I have made that property yours. Therefore, from now on, the said property as per the schedule is yours
T

encumbranceDetails.description: VILL/COL: CHITRACHEDU/ALL(0-0) W-B: 00 SURVEY: 492 EXTENT: 112.44SQ.Yds BUILT: 0SQ. FT Boundires: [N]: HOUSE OF NARASI MHUDU [S] HOUSE OF P.B.RAMA DEVI [E]: C.C.ROAD [W]: VACANT SITE OF OBANNA Link Doct:0/0 of SRO 1213

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 285 of 2026, dated 28/Jan/2026, executed by Kottam jayamma in favour of Her Husband, Kottam Narasimhudu, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 112.44 Sq. Yds., bearing house number 1A-65, Assessment number 196418000065, comprised in survey number 492, situated in Chitrachedu Village and Panchayath, Peddavaduguru Mandal, within the District of Anantapur, registered at sub-registrar office Pamidi (1213) is bounded as follows: North by: House Of Narasimudu South by: House Of P.B. Rama Devi East by: C.C. Road West by: Vacant Site Of Obanna.
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
